submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        m = n//2
        arr = []
        has = []
        for i in range(m):
            a,b = nums[i],nums[n-i-1]
            if a > b:
                a,b = b,a
            arr.append(b-a)
            has.append(max(k-a,b))
        cnt = Counter(arr)
        has.sort()

        res = n
        l = 0
        for k,v in sorted(cnt.items(),key=lambda x:x[0]):
            t = (m-v)
            if k > 0:
                pos = bisect_left(has,k,l)
                l = pos
                t += l
            res = min(res, t)
        return res
